name: TOYSREVIL Mascot Stickers Series 1 (Loose)
description: Remember that TOYSREVIL Mascot Stickers Series 1 with a header card? well, this particular version features the individual stickers "loose" = hand-cut from the A5-sized single sheet, for a more "economical" shipping cost! TOYSREVIL Mascot Stickers Series 1 consists of designs from QUICCS (The Philippines), Nelz Yumul (The Philippines), ANTZ (Singapore), Javier jimenez (Spain), ZiQi Wu (Malaysia) and Ario Anindito (Indonesia) - all diecut as peelable stickers! Price per sticker pack is US$5 per, and comes along with three other hand-cute TOYSREVIL stickers. SHIPPING: - Additional US$2 per for International Orders, with items Airmailed out flat in an envelope. - FREE shipping in Singapore! Mailed out flat in an envelope.

name: Original Ink Sketch: MARV by #TOYSREVILART #Murderbot Series
description:
Listed here for sale is a single piece of an original (blue pen) ink sketch titled "MARV" (from my "Murderbot" homage series).

Drawn on a 55mm X 88mm sized white cards (for #inktober and #botober), each piece is priced at US$20 (including shipping worldwide), with 100% of the sales proceeds to go into contributing to my father's current medical bills. Thank you for your interests and support :)

Item will be mailed flat in a bubble-envelope via Airmail (for international orders) and SpeedPost in Singapore. Optional "Registered Article" for overseas orders is an additional US$2.00 per order (Listed as "Shipping"). Combined order is accepted and welcomed :)

name: TEQ63 Red STGCC-Edition
description:
"TEQ63" STGCC-Edition in all RED is an exclusive to TOYSREVIL, limited to only 10 pieces, with each pack including a signed and number card, and an additional sticker from creator and designer QUICCS (http://behance.net/quiccs).

The TEQ63 stands 4 inches tall (from sole to tip), and possesses "articulation" at the neck region. TEQ63 is hand-painted red on resin casted figure. (Due to this nature of production, there might be some minor flaws in the surface finishing or paint application).

Released at the Singapore Toy, Games and Comic Convention 2013 (Aug 31-Sept 1), less than half of the stock is currently put online for sales here!

Sales will begin Friday September 5th 12noon (+8 GMT Singapore-time)

SHIPPING+HANDLING:
International sales are an additional US$15 (inclusive of 'Registered Mail' status) and item mailed out in a box.

Local/Singapore shipping will be an additional US$5, with and item mailed out in a box via SpeedPost.

Limited to one piece per order per customer please, thank you.

name: TOYSREVIL Mascot Stickers Series 1
description:
TOYSREVIL Mascot Stickers Series 1 consists of designs from QUICCS (The Philippines), Nelz Yumul (The Philippines), ANTZ (Singapore), Javier jimenez (Spain), ZiQi Wu (Malaysia) and Ario Anindito (Indonesia) - all diecut as peelable stickers!

The sticker sheet is sized approximately A5 (5+" x 8+" ) and has been hand-trimmed by myself (so the size IS approximate lol) and each purchase is for a single sheet.

Launching circa the 2013 Singapore Toy Games and Comic Convention, a total of 30 packs will come with this header-card, specially made for this event. Until such time the stock runs out, the subsequent packs will not include the header shown. This is an ''open run''.

Price per sticker pack is US$5 per, and does not include shipping costs (share orders with friends and save on shipping).

Item will be mailed out flat-packed with an additional backing board, with International Airmail including Registered Airmail, and locally / Singapore via SpeedPost.

Thanks for your support and purchase, folks!

name: WUKONG: ANTZ vs Crappy Cat
description:
Listed here is one piece of a customized collectible from urban artist ANTZ (www.antzwashere.com) using a 3-inch tall "Flunky Monkey" collectible vinyl figure (form designed by Vanbeater / produced by Unacat).

This one-of-a-kind piece comes with some sculpted accents and is hand-painted by ANTZ, and is dubbed "WUKONG", and is a rendition of his seminal character - which in this case is utterly PERFECT on  monkey, innit? Lovely WuKong … Don't Hit Me, WuKong…

Price is US$50.00 per piece (excluding shipping costs). 

This piece comes bagged with a header-card signed by the artist ANTZ himself. The bag itself comes with easy access at the base, without the fear of tearing into the header-card!

SHIPPING  & HANDLING;
- S/H for International Purchases are an additional US$15 - inclusive "Registered Article" status - via Airmail.
- S/H for Local / Singapore purchases are an additional US$5 - delivered via SpeedPost. Item will be mailed out in a box.

This item will be made available for public sales on August 21st at 12noon (+8 GMT Singapore time).

name: BONES: ANTZ vs Crappy Cat
description:
Listed here is one piece of a customized collectible from urban artist ANTZ (www.antzwashere.com / rscls.org) using a 3-inch tall "Crappy Cat" collectible vinyl figure (form designed by Vanbeater / produced by Unacat).

This one-of-a-kind piece comes with some sculpted accents and is hand-painted by ANTZ, and is dubbed "BONES", because, well, his body shows bones … and he ha=s gnarly teeth too, but i don't think he'll appreciate being called "TEETH", ya know? :p

Price is US$50.00 per piece (excluding shipping costs). 

This piece comes bagged with a header-card signed by the artist ANTZ himself. The bag itself comes with easy access at the base, without the fear of tearing into the header-card!

SHIPPING  & HANDLING;
- S/H for International Purchases are an additional US$15 - inclusive "Registered Article" status - via Airmail.
- S/H for Local / Singapore purchases are an additional US$5 - delivered via SpeedPost. Item will be mailed out in a box.

This item will be made available for public sales on August 21st at 12noon (+8 GMT Singapore time).

… but I could call him "BITE" too, ya know? :)

name: Lady Maxx Comicbook Issue #1
description:
This is for an order of a single issue of Lady Maxx Comicbook Issue #1 - from Max Toy Co. Item will be delivered with a plastic mylar sleeve with an acid-free backing board insert.

"The first issue features nearly 30 pages of sequential stories and pin-up art from Bob Conge, Marcus Conge, Daniel Goffin, Shane Haddy, TOVI, Alex Wald, Mark Nagata, and Andy Heng (of TOYSREVIL)"

SHIPPING: 
- International Postage is US$6 inclusive handling and will be sent via flat bubble-pack envelope via Regular airmail.

- Shipping within Singapore is US$3 inclusive shipping and handling.

Check out some page previews here: http://toysrevil.blogspot.sg/2012/06/lady-maxx-comic-book-issue-1-in-sg.html

name: "Heart of Lava" - TOYSREVIL-Edition Mini Goji by The Yellow Dino
description:
This is an order for a "Heart of Lava" - TOYSREVIL-Edition Mini Goji by The Yellow Dino, as made by My Tummy Toys.

First made available for pre-order at the Singapore Toy Games & Comic Convention 2012, the all-resin Mini Goji is limited to only 10 pieces made for production sales, and will come with a numbered 'Certificate of Authenticity' and housed in it's own specially printed carton box.

Mini Goji stands 5" tall and is made of solid transparent resin with the TOYSREVIL resin logo sculpt inside. For color graduation and solid colors, car paint has been used.

SRP for 1 x Mini Goji is US$100, with shipping+handling to International be an additional US$35, and to Singapore-addresses is US$20. The item will be posted out from Indonesia, so it is imperative that you confirm your shipping address during Paypal payment, thank you!

This order will be opened on September 15th @ 12noon (+8 GMT Singapore-time). One order per household per account please. First Come First Served, while stocks last!

View production line pictures here: http://toysrevil.blogspot.sg/2012/09/heart-of-lava-toysrevil-edition-mini.html

name: The Yellow Dino x TOYSREVIL GOJI Metal Print
description:
This is for an order of a PRINT on ALUMINUM PLATE featuring an artwork illustration from The Yellow Dino x TOYSREVIL! 

Released during the Singapore Toy Games and Comic Convention 2012, the production run is limited to only 20 prints, measuring 17cm x 26cm - they are printed on 1mm thick aluminum plates with coating via a UV Material print technique, making this the first ever "tin" print for TOYSREVIL!

The item comes housed in a plastic mylar sleeve with an acid-free backing board insert, making a total of 145.5gsm. Price per print is US$25.00 (excluding shipping+handling costs).

The item will come signed by both artists (refer to insert image), and numbered (Numbering will be assigned to sequential purchase of the item).

SHIPPING:  - International Postage is US$8.00 inclusive handling and will be sent via flat bubble-pack envelope via "Registered Article" airmail.

- Local shipping in Singapore is US$2.00 via regular mail.

name: Limited Edition ANTZ Print
description:
This is for an order of a PRINT featuring an artwork illustration from ANTZ!

Released during the Singapore Toy Games and Comic Convention 2012, the production run is limited to only 20 prints, measuring 17cm x 26cm - they are printed on 250gsm Diamond White Card, and comes housed in a plastic mylar sleeve with an acid-free backing board insert. Price per print is US$16.00 (excluding shipping+handling costs).

The item comes unsigned and un-numbered.

SHIPPING:  - International Postage is US$6 inclusive handling and will be sent via flat bubble-pack envelope via "Registered Article" airmail.

- Local shipping in Singapore is 'FREE'! (**Only for this individual item, and not applicable for combined shipping costs)

name: TOYSREVIL-Edition Turtle Tetsujins from Peter Kato
description:
Released at Singapore Toy Games & Comic Convention 2012, Peter Kato' TOYSREVIL-Edition TURTLE TETSUJIN is now available to purchase online! Limited to only 20 pieces, the figurine is now made available for International Sales and priced at US$25 per (sans shipping+handling)!

Each resin figurine is hand-casted and hand-painted by Peter Kato in the USA, and features a red fade from milky-resin with grey "battle-weathered" accents, and the TOYSREVIL-logo embeddd in the chest, for a true TOYSREVIL-Edition!

The figurine comes bagged with header-card featuring hand-doodles by Peter himself on the back. As well each purchase comes with a (random) Turtle Tetsujin button and a Foldout catalog showcasing TOYSREVIL-Exclusive Toys for STGCC 2012 Release.

A maximum of 2 x orders per account per household, thanks! First come first served, while stocks last! 

SHIPPING+HANDLING: 
Is an additional US$6 via Regular Airmail. Item will be mailed out in a bubble-envelope.

name: Evil Olee (Red Colorway)
description:
Released in celebration of the Chinese Lunar New Year!

EVIL OLEES in Red Colorway stand 3" tall and features a pair of relief-sculpted "eyes" painted in glossy white to match the gloosy-red resin figure surface. Limited to only 10 pieces made (in this colorway) - each figure comes bagged-n-tagged with header-card (but will be posted out via box). These are first-come-first-served and are available to one per order per household, thanks!

DO NOTE: These are hand-crafted an hand-painted resin collectibles from My Tummy Toys, and paint-applications and slight defects are to be expected.

International Shipping anywhere in the world is US$12.00 via air (inclusive Registered Article).

Local / Singapore-shipping is US$6.00 (unregistered status, posted via SpeedPost).

Thank you for your support!
